column3: “Bought a nosecone joint from Mercy Wellness center. My friends and I immediately went outside to start a gardening project after two hits. Upon getting outside we proceeded to finish the joint , forgetting about the project entirely and making grand plans for the renovation of the backyard. Then we realized we didn't have any gloves or tools. We went back to our original project of planting our clones with children's...”

“I rarely indulge in pure indica strains.  I've never had anything quite like this.  Brings on giddiness like no other.   You're  laughing at things that aren't even funny.  Makes you feel like a little kid.  So much fun.  You can't stop smiling and laughing.  Erases any bad mood.”

“Experience: The name really says it all. After 2 hits, I started to feel a tingling warming sensation around my face, cheeks, teeth and gums. This is perfect for smiling, even if you don’t want to. Very relaxing, body feels like it’s melting butter, shoulders unclenched. This is also a very social indica, with little couch-lock; perfect for chillin’. YAY!  I give it 18 out-of 5 stars!
Usage: Perfect for a bowl in the...”

“It's like God Himself gave me mouth to mouth resuscitation and then sucker punched me to galaxies I never knew I thought existed. Earthy, herbal, smooth and fragrant at the exhale, a one hitter I thought was too little, but in the end, was just right. It hit me like a train, and it was a deep, hard hitting high that lulled me to sleep and relaxed me so good I couldn't think straight. 
6/5 stars. Absolutely fucking in...”

“I've always preferred burning the stinky, sticky, big fat daily indica buds mainly, I think, because the  couch lock inducing buzz that they bring has been the most effective calming my mind. the high that I get is so equal, yet opposite, of the manic state that my brain usually navigates in that is is the most soothing thing I've ever experienced. lately my choices in herb have been sativa/sativa hybrid heavy, and I...”

“This is a great night time knockout indica. This melts my muscles like no other strain. I would not use this during the day. But at night, I have found nothing else that worked as well for killing my chronic back pain. I am a novice, and this has not made me too anxious. Maybe a little anxiety occasionally at the onset. But play video games, watch TV or something, and that will blow over, and you can just enjoy the r...”

“Fucking incredible is an indica dominant strain, and a pretty solid one at that. This is strain is very relaxing, excellent for stress relief and anxiety. It's not overly heavy, but is still very potent. Just an overall solid indica strain.”
“100% Indica and it truly truly IS FUCKING INCREDIBLE...!”

“WOW WOW WOW!!!!! I just heard they got these insanely high tested strains in.   Rushed down there. They were not kidding. The EFFing Incredible is Definitely EFFing Incredible!!!  The new stuff is all so amazing, I had to create a leafly account and give them amazing reviews. This strains magically makes all my problems go away!  I can't believe it, 33.6% THC in Bullhead City, AZ.  Go see for yourself folks.”

“Just smoked it. Started feeling tingly on lips then tongue then they felt kinda numb... The tingly just starts spreading over my body... Eyes feel very squinty... I feel like im rocking myself but i dont think im moving lol  my thoughts are wiped... Im spacey... Enjoying the hot/cold tingling moving around my body...  It feels AWESOME!    I dont feel tired.  I feel as if i cant move...   And all my anxiety is blocked...”

“I cannot find a negative comment for Fucking Incredible.  Perhaps my major complaint is my back is killing me because I renovated my front and backyard with this strain.  Every morning a bong load with a cup of coffee was fucking incredible.  Motivating because it gets me a little sleepy however folks might like that because of my hyperactivity.  This strain keeps me inspired all day.”
“Super hairy! Bright orange hairs; these flowers look like Swamp Thing. Lives up to its name.”

“I really love the high with this strain, now it isn't something that I'd smoke all day long, I actually have to get things done. It's full body relaxation along with a euphoria that often borders on giddy. The bud looks amazing it's dense and chunky covered in crystals and it tastes alot how really good weed used to taste so it tastes really good. I will definitely be looking for more of this.”

“One of the most unique strains I've had in a while ( I like to pick up at least 2 different strains a week.) I have been dabbing for quite some time. This strain is personally one of the most drunk feeling strains I have ever experienced. 

After I took the first dab (.075g)I found my body to instantly relax, pain I get from lower back diminished to almost nothing. I was still clear headed but yet very relaxed.

Afte...”

“I found this little gem off the beaten path in Silvana, WA. It was recommended to me for great pain relief properties. It is a beautiful fluffy green, and so soft. the taste is incredible and smokes super smooth. It seems to be a sneaky high, but doesn't give me couch-lock like many other Indicas do, which is nice. Pretty decent for pain relief and anxiety.”

“I heard people talking about this strain while standing in line on 4/20 and decided to give it a try. The bud was pretty sticky, with an earthy and slightly skunky aroma and pine on the exhale. It hit the head pretty fast, but mellowed out into a relaxed and peaceful state where I could barely keep my eyes open and had to force myself to move from the couch to my bed. The worries that have filled my head lately were ...”

“Fucking Incredible was my first favorite. Its all I used to want to smoke when I had choices. It made me SO creative. My imagination pretty much ran wild. It was definitely an upper". But to this day

“Smoked a beautiful fat Saturday night blunt with this stuff followed by a vapeing sesh with the flight box and absolutely soared.  This stuff simply put is fucking incredible. This is the perfect stuff to ease your worries and free your mind in preparation for an amazing night. I highly recommend it to anyone that can come by it.”
“I think the name says it all”
“Okay, I'm editing my review of this WONDERFUL strain.  It truly is fucking incredible"....it's the BEST strain for nighttime for me
column10: the list goes on and on.  After three years of treating myself with cannabis for all these conditions
column11: I have quite a bit of tolerance to many strains and this one just DELIVERS

column3: “Potent strain definitely for a patient with a higher tolerance or experiencing great deals of pain or suffering from insomnia”
“Great for medical use.”
“great head high, it moves in fast and makes you say, wow
“After just three hits and I’m set. I feel so relaxed, comfortable, and chill. I love this strain!”
“Found it to be a Strong Indica with really good taste. The head rush is Fk'n Incredible with a chill phase to follow.”
“Good pain blocking and relaxation but couch lock like a mofo.”

“Got this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA.  Check my blog out AgingEnt.com

column3: “You instantly understand the name when you see the buds at Greenworks. This strain is almost a solid glob of trichomes with a bit of green plant material attached! The taste is heavy and hash-like. Get your flying carpet ready!”
“great head high, it moves in fast and makes you say, wow

“Picked up a gram of this, by Doc Croc, on the advice of a budtender from Natural Blessing in Tacoma/Spanaway, WA. This stuff lives up to its name - for more than one reason. At a total potency of 37.5% it took my wife and I 4 hours to get through one very small bowl, a few hits at a time.

The high comes on fast, with a buzzy tingling sensation around the eyes and back of the head. The arousal quotient on this one is...”
“Great for medical use.”

“I’m on the fence with this strain. Usually after one puff, I’m super relaxed, sleepy, and ready to pass out. It seems to suddenly hit me after a few minutes. However, if I smoke just a liiiiiittle bit too much, I get crazy anxiety, panic, and feel like I’m going to die. This strain is very potent and I’d recommend starting off with small hits if you’re someone who’s prone to anxiety like I am, and give it a few minut...”

column3: “Found it to be a Strong Indica with really good taste. The head rush is Fk'n Incredible with a chill phase to follow.”
“Great for medical use.”
“A good night time strain right before bed.  Helps you relax from the day and drift away into space”
“Top-tier indica perfect for body relaxation and getting to sleep”

“Fucking Incredible is a good name for this strain, especially with the fucking incredible numbers for it coming from Doc Croc lately.  Got a couple grams from my go-to store, Cannarail Station, and the potency analysis for this one is an incredible 38.8%!  Two hits from my pipe and all pain was just gone.  Love this strain!”
“Stopped by a dispensary and asked for a potent indica, and they gave me this. This one was $20 per gram. This stuff was loud, dense and sticky. All the stereotypes for dank weed.”

“Agreed with the almost giddy-like high,  although that part didn't last for too long.  It's got an uppy high for an indica,  good body stone but no couchlock. Pretty good overall pain relief which is rad. Felt tired after a few hours. Enjoyed it and would look for to smoke again”

“Fucking Incredible is a good name for this strain, especially with the fucking incredible numbers for it coming from Doc Croc lately.  Got a couple grams from my go-to store, Cannarail Station, and the potency analysis for this one is an incredible 38.8%!  Two hits from my pipe and all pain was just gone.  Love this strain!”
“Pretty good strain. I've had better but this one is still good. I doesn't get you too high to where you freak out even if you smoke 3 bowls.”
“In da couch....perfect laziness!....a stoners delight....have aj" today!....”"
“Top-tier indica perfect for body relaxation and getting to sleep”
“Name should be fuckin mediocre.  Very mild high & short lasting”
“The name says it all. Had me sitting on my own couch wondering where I was. FUCKING INCREDIBLE”
“true to its name”
“A good night time strain right before bed.  Helps you relax from the day and drift away into space”
“Name should be fuckin mediocre.  Very mild high & short lasting”

“Overall its a really good weed. i was stoned out of my mind. plus The nausea and stomach i had went away in after puffs. It was kind of a couch lock when alone but with when getting high with company were very loud and talkative. Mostly stoner talk. Its fucking incredible!”
“Picked this strain up from Evergreen Patient Network in Everett, WA. I tend to eat a good deal with this strain, so I always take a run by the grocery store before I smoke this strain.”
“The name says it all. Had me sitting on my own couch wondering where I was. FUCKING INCREDIBLE”
“true to its name”
“Pretty good strain. I've had better but this one is still good. I doesn't get you too high to where you freak out even if you smoke 3 bowls.”
“FI is f***king perfect for me!  Seriously, I love the very relaxed high with pain relief.  And for me, the head rush is very smooth and relaxing.  Great for anxiety.”
“A good night time strain right before bed.  Helps you relax from the day and drift away into space”
“Name should be fuckin mediocre.  Very mild high & short lasting”
“Stopped by a dispensary and asked for a potent indica, and they gave me this. This one was $20 per gram. This stuff was loud, dense and sticky. All the stereotypes for dank weed.”
“Pretty good strain. I've had better but this one is still good. I doesn't get you too high to where you freak out even if you smoke 3 bowls.”
“for me fucking incredible was fucking ok. been hard core smoker for 32 years and I found it lacking in flavor and potency. sorry.”
“love it ,,, my mouth turned numb”
“was really a diffrent high. Kind of boring, but yet enjoyable.”

“I'm a huge indica smoker myself and I absolutely love this strain it is my all time favorite. My anxiety faded away my ptsd was gone and I was so relaxed. It is some of the best stuff I've ever had I o my wish they grew it out here in Arizona.”
“Picked this strain up from Evergreen Patient Network in Everett, WA. I tend to eat a good deal with this strain, so I always take a run by the grocery store before I smoke this strain.”

“When vaped at the 388/390 like I hit everything else, this strain didn't do much besides make me really tired and a little depressed. It worked a lot better with the temperature jacked up to 440. At that point it made me creative and giggly. Either way this is an ideal strain for insomniacs with a high that quickly dissipates.”
“A good night time strain right before bed.  Helps you relax from the day and drift away into space”
“love it ,,, my mouth turned numb”
“was really a diffrent high. Kind of boring, but yet enjoyable.”
“for me fucking incredible was fucking ok. been hard core smoker for 32 years and I found it lacking in flavor and potency. sorry.”

“Agreed with the almost giddy-like high,  although that part didn't last for too long.  It's got an uppy high for an indica,  good body stone but no couchlock. Pretty good overall pain relief which is rad. Felt tired after a few hours. Enjoyed it and would look for to smoke again”
“Pretty good strain. I've had better but this one is still good. I doesn't get you too high to where you freak out even if you smoke 3 bowls.”
“Name should be fuckin mediocre.  Very mild high & short lasting”
“Very fluffy, created heavy thick smokes, fucking incredible! insta-baked.”
“for me fucking incredible was fucking ok. been hard core smoker for 32 years and I found it lacking in flavor and potency. sorry.”
“FI is f***king perfect for me!  Seriously, I love the very relaxed high with pain relief.  And for me, the head rush is very smooth and relaxing.  Great for anxiety.”

“True to its name!!! I got this because of the name and OHMYGOD. I have a very high tolerance and find that most flower doesn't do it for me. This was different! Two small bowls had me LIFTED. Very euphoric and pleasant. Earthy in taste. I'm honestly coming down right now so I can't keep a very good train of thought so”
“best indica ever and mari j's in everett is place that consistently has it. pain free loving life!”
“One of the firest strains I' ve smoked this semester. Straight up knock out taste amazing and hits hard as fuck. Killed a quarter in a few hours”
“Instant lightheaded feeling after holding in or blowing out hit . Tastes very good and a nice sleepy relaxed high..”

“True to its name. I have extensive, intense, chronic pain. This stuff is Fucking Incredible at handling my pain. I bought some beautiful nugs and made my own oil that I take in capsules so I can't give you a review on smoke or taste.”

“Fucking Incredible is a great strain to smoke and to grow. When growing, you immediately notice the plant's sweet, unique smell as it continues through the flowering stage. Visually, the F'in Inc can get very purple, almost black, depending on finishing dates and temperature. The plant is littered with trichomes and has great bag appeal. To smoke, the smell is replicated in the taste. Very sweet.

I would reccomend...”

“I just got this yesterday. I been wanting to try it forever. Smoke this in the evening hours and you will be out like a light. I suffer from bad insomnia and smoking this kept me asleep through the night!”
“good smell, pretty good body effects helps with sleep but still can stay focused.”
“I told the budtender, Dude
column4: I have a rage disorder that I am fighting like a motherf**ker today. Suggest!" And he said

column3: sir

column1: Rage disorder in check. Pseudo-giddy lift
column2: odd for a straight Indica for me. No couchlock
column3: so far. Relaxed and kinda thinky. Smells delicious.

column1: I dig it. So will you.”"

column3: “When I first saw this strain, the name alone was enough to get my attention. I read some of the reviews, here on Leafly ,and decided that I needed to get some. In the jar, it has a sweet aroma to it. Similar to Blue Dream. I use a Herbalaire Elite vape as my weapon of choice. I cook the product at 365 degrees C for 2 to 3 minutes, then turn on the pump and fill the bag. After smoking one bag (bread bag size), we have...”
“I get horrible headaches on a daily basis. This strain has been the best for them. Definitely have me a happy high.”
“Amazing”
“Tastes very good. Smooth exhale.”
“I don't normally do Indica strains but this is sensational. I highly recommend this if you're in a bad mood which I have been at my job the last 10 months this has been a lifesaver!”

“I love that this strain is mould and pest resistant making it perfect for growing in the rainy west coast weather. It was fun watching how much resin this strain produced - fantastic calming effects for pain and anxiety relief.”

“True to its name. I have extensive, intense, chronic pain. This stuff is Fucking Incredible at handling my pain. I bought some beautiful nugs and made my own oil that I take in capsules so I can't give you a review on smoke or taste.”
“This strain was recommended by my budtender and wow this pure indica is a heavy hitter. Skunky spicy smell nice taste. Great for night”
“This stuff just makes me tired and depressed.  Great insomnia but little else.”
“one of my all time favs. gets me through any rough day!”
“Hits pretty well, but taking too much made me feel paranoid, but a good classic effect (like your first time smoking) nonetheless if smoked the right amount”
“The name matches the effects. Great for insomnia this is a lovely indica”

“Kaboom...
unbelievable taste. Did I taste cinnamon ? Heavy on the cranium. Dark Side of the Moon in the forecast”

“Very soothing and calming. I had a bout of bad nausea and this was one of the couple strains that really calmed that quick and well but let me do some lowkey things, reading and knitting! I only lost count of my stitches a little more often than normal. It's a mellow indica, but the soothing part seemed kind of especially nice, like I felt peaceful. Peace & love & all that!!”
“OMFG!!! We are regular consumers and this blew our heads off!!! Watched a disney movie while vaping and laughed the whole time. Felt like legs were cut off at the knees, but it was funny.”
“smells amazing, hits real nice”

“When I first saw this strain, the name alone was enough to get my attention. I read some of the reviews, here on Leafly ,and decided that I needed to get some. In the jar, it has a sweet aroma to it. Similar to Blue Dream. I use a Herbalaire Elite vape as my weapon of choice. I cook the product at 365 degrees C for 2 to 3 minutes, then turn on the pump and fill the bag. After smoking one bag (bread bag size), we have...”

“this is the kind of high that every stoner dreams of. theres nothing negative, the sun feels brighter, everythings funnier, everything is beautifil, it doesnt knock you out but its very relaxing. theres nothing to worry about and youre stoned as fuck 3 puffs into a bowl. perfect to listen to music and skate to, draw with, or even just go for a walk in the park. by far one of my absolute favorite weeds. very positive ...”
“-1st Degree BLACK BELT BUD- This would be 2nd Degree or more but I couldn't deduce what was so really that incredible about it besides the obvious...”

“Perfect balance of emotions and super pain control! Love this strain, it is definitely going on my list of favorites! I love the smooth smoke and the smell, but don't let it fool you.....It can creep up and smack you like a freight train if you go overboard too quickly!

I highly recommend this Dispensary too!! 
Nature's AZ Medicines, Phoenix Location

The Customer Service and care is outstanding!”
“this was a great strain, you must appreciate a good indica to enjoy, it's great for p.m. hour”
“This was like a Mack truck going 75 rolling over me. Super strong indica that put me down for the count. Must recommend for pain relief, migraines, or if you just want to check out for the evening.”

“Life is entirely subjective and such is true for our individual experiences with our hempen friends. 

Fuckin’ incredible is how I felt. It was my first legal transaction as a Washington resident and a palliative end of an insane stretch of weeks. 

You see, we’d left a family vacation at the white sands of Pensacola (their sand is white because quartz spent thousands of years traveling down the continent during the ...”
“Great for your mind”
“When you absolutely have to be on the couch, fast asleep and drooling...  This is the one.  Quick onset, long lasting.”
“Definitely all in the name, love that piney/earthy taste. Helped with my back pain and to pass out.”
“very nice relaxing body high works wonders on pain as well”

“I typically smoke only at night, so I did not like that it was such a focused high.  It was more of a body high that wore off within 2 hours.  If you wanted to get some work done, this is a great strain for you.”
“AmericannaRx Only one in Portland with that kapow name says it all from the smell to the nice sized dense flowers great pain relief”

“'I neverrr kneww there was a strain like this before..
never knew that I could get this high..
high like this anymore'

Reference: Faith Evans - Love Like This

..

But seriously, good shit. Helps me stay focused and clean my room. I take Adderall for ADD and Zoloft for OCD in which the serotonin increase accentuates the Adderall (I've also been diagnosed with Asp. Syndrome but I think I'm actually Schizoid,) anyway,...”

“I bought a three pack of .7 gram cones from Mr. Doobees in Long Beach, WA. The grower was Rogue Raven and boy oh boy were they amazing! It was smooth and tasty! I would definitely recommend giving this strain a try.”
“The name says it all.”
“Great Indica. Aroma and taste is exceptional. High is creative and pleasant, yet short.”
“I like it”
“Great body high with a smooth after affect! Makes you feel like you're floating on air!”
“I am always looking for couch lock as I am an insomniac.  This is pretty average, the name sets the wrong expectation it's just an average indica.  At least what I had was average.”

“It is just as its name suggests! Holy smokes!!! This strain perfect for sitting around with a group like minded folks and see who laughs the most, succumbs to the munchies that results or who falls asleep the quickest. LOL
It would definitely liven up a gathering!”

“this is no joke definitely an indica, but in such a pleasant way. as opposed to the couch lock it's much more like a comfy blanket at all times. great body experience and worked well enough for mild to moderate pain (bothersome but not prohibiting). if there could have only been a strong sleepy sensation this would have been a 5, but that is simply my desire in an indica.”
“I got a 1 gram pack from Higher Leaf and was promised is was a good sleep aid for my partner. No, it wasn't. In fact, it wasn't very good at all.”
“I ate everything in my house after smoking this. I need to grocery shop.”
“I love the earthy taste to it and usually about 2 hits in everything just relaxes. You feel at peace. 10/10 would recommend:D”

“Makes me feel soft, like room-temperature butter, not runny though. Tingly for sure. Could sleep but not too tired. Feel kind of creative and funny but also lazy. Kinda euphoric feeling. In a really good mood.”
“Put me on couch lock, but never made me sleepy. just a really good chill high.”

“This shit sounds amazing. I've never seen a strain with this amount of reviews that correlate with exact what I want. Hopefully I'll be able to try this at some point. Also, I've never seen a strain with the spicy scent so I'm looking forward to that.”

“(.5g) OD grown

FI is really FI.....So far this is my favorite treatment for insomnia, not only because it helps relieve stress after a long day, but because it leaves you with a bit of an uplifting, positive vibe that carries into the next morning (sometimes), starting the day off free from burn-out, and most depression. I have not experienced any couch-lock from this strain, but as a day time strain, she is too wea...”
“A very good stone noticeably different buzz”

“wow since I've gotten this app I've seen flowers that I thought was forgotten about one of them being this one (tora bora) being another both do the same effects for sleep and pain FUCKING AWESOME that leafly has so much knowledge about cannabis and that this app keeps surprising me. smoked this flower in the 8th grade right be4 going surfing it was 2002 and it was a great flower 9/10”
“Lives up to its name. An Insomniac's wet dream. Hoard this shit like gold bullion.”
“definitely is i expected, as matter fact Leafly im writing a song on, the purple on my strand went straight to my 3rd Eye, feeling open!!{•^>^•}!!”
“picked up this strain today for $12 a gram. Bomb-ass fire. 25%+ tested THC. Great to chill and relax...rude name, pleasant experience 🙂”

“I did a dab of some beautiful shatter of this strain it wasn't long before I was laughing at how f'd up I was from that 1 dab. I gotta nod in agreement with most of the comments here. Not a strain to smoke before work. LOL! It's f-ing incredible.”
“by far the strongest strain that I've had in a long time. the dry mouth is intense lol. got it from The Good dispensary”
“name says it all.  I was very relaxed.  not exactly sleeping but just in a very calm resting state where I didn't wanna move.  made shrimp fajitas Sooooooooo lol”
“Good strain but not as potent as I thought it was going to be. I personally need to smoke a lot to actually get that Indica effect and knock out”
“ok”
“One of my favorite strains if you want a strong sedation. I only like to have it every couple of months because I like to keep the strong strains for rare occasions.”
“very earthy. Vaped this and enjoyed a chill evening around the fire with friends. It made me feel relaxed, happy, and social.”

“I cannot find a negative comment for Fucking Incredible.  Perhaps my major complaint is my back is killing me because I renovated my front and backyard with this strain.  Every morning a bong load with a cup of coffee was fucking incredible.  Motivating because it gets me a little sleepy however folks might like that because of my hyperactivity.  This strain keeps me inspired all day.”
“this herb is somethin else... Definitely going to the to of list after tonight. It has such a great taste and heavy effects. Highly recommended.”

“Was skeptical at first, I mean the name right? Someone thinks highly of themselves! Well, turns out, honest like a boy scout. Glad I tried it. Adding this one to my regular rotation.  Nice smooth smoke, light taste. Lasts several hours, come down isn't harsh. Would recommend.”
“my favorite hands down”
“Love it. Dank ass weed”
“Euphoric and relaxed. Who could ask for anything more?”
“This strain is nice if your looking to relax.”
“Classic body high. Nothing special about this strain, good strain to have around for a rainy day.”
“The name says it all. A very pungant piney smell. crystals are less visible, but the flower provides the punch that the name promised. Obtained at the Cookies dispensary in SJ.”
“Not disappointed”

“This strain is fucking incredible. The name says it all.  I've never been evinced to marijuana helping depression, as I have dysthymia-a persistent melancholy.  However, after the first time with this strain and since, my moods have been more uplifting, a confident chill vibe. This by far is an excellent strain.”
“Awesome!!! Had it as Infinity" too which was this and something else...but either way both where awesome. Great heavy smoke.”"
“i love it. great high.”
“the name says it all! BOOM”
“Wonderful soothing pain relieving bliss, as you ride the wave of every cloud exhaled. Anxiety, along with body aches and pains, melt away with each tasty sticky hit.”

“My wife and I wanted something that was going to give us a little more of a high. So we asked our weed barista what they had for someone with a high tolerance. This stuff is great. We smoked it when we got home and were very impressed. It is a great high and lasts too. We get this for the weekends. Definitely not something that you want to smoke if you have something to do.”

“I love this strain. Best one for me by far. I felt happy and light hearted after smoking. It lasts several hours after only 2 small hits. It helps headaches while on it, and pain in my body is gone. But the next morning it causes a headache almost hangoverish. The dry mouth and eyes is another side effect. I did noticeI did not get hungry with this strain. You get the munchies but not so bad that you feel sick if you...”
“flattened" me out
column4: felt like my mind was blank.”"

column3: “Just happened to see this at a new shop we went to an it is fu***n incredible lol pretty stoney nice lasting effects with a slight body buzz for me”
“This strain definitely lives up to its name.”
“Tastes very good. Smooth exhale.”
“Amazing”
“I get horrible headaches on a daily basis. This strain has been the best for them. Definitely have me a happy high.”

column1: I dig it. So will you.”"

“we are proud to admitt that this heavy indica did its job mildly couchlocked we are feeling good focused like really really focused its a good high very good.  gives you the munchies though on our way to thr kitchen as we speak”
“Fucking Incredible. Oh, it'll definitely have you feeling that way. Smoke up and sit down, son. And stay down. Lives up to the name.”
“hope to find FI in phoenix someday”

“Fucking Incredible is a great strain to smoke and to grow. When growing, you immediately notice the plant's sweet, unique smell as it continues through the flowering stage. Visually, the F'in Inc can get very purple, almost black, depending on finishing dates and temperature. The plant is littered with trichomes and has great bag appeal. To smoke, the smell is replicated in the taste. Very sweet.

I would reccomend...”
“was a great strain for the end of our road trip and then our next trip to bed lol”
“Instant lightheaded feeling after holding in or blowing out hit . Tastes very good and a nice sleepy relaxed high..”
“Very smooth high will buy again fun to blaze with friends”

“I did it before bedtime, enough to get wasted with a bowl and a half. It relaxed my body enough to get some sleep for several hours without the usual insomnia, my pain dropped a couple notches, stiffness was less severe. I liked it ok and have been using marijuana medicinally for a wide variety of reasons over 48 years. If I see it reappear at my local dispensary I will get more.”

“from my personal notes: 

Was, indeed, incredible. Manages mania (I am bipolar). Mild euphoria, relaxed, anxiety melts away. Body feels warm, slightly tingly, and seems to slowly vanish. Very I am a cloud" feeling
column4: but not in a weird way. Like a warm blanket. A large dose feels like being completely covered in a thick comforter.

column1: Additional: will make you cough. A lot.”"

column3: “medium body high and pretty much nothing else.”
“The name says it all. Very relaxing high but still able to function.”

“hey , yes fucking incredible is an awesome strain to smoke . Im from Sf , we have a lot of mixed cookies everywhere ! . However reading this strain told me that its Orignal Gangster strain. When I smoked it I did feel the numbness in my mouth , followed by a sweet taste that lingered in my mouth . The smell of the strain is Apple-Citrus smell. The buds were trimmed amazing in my batch .”
“Should be called Perfectly Mediocre. Quick head rush, then disipates and leaves you red eyed and tired.”
“recreational store up the road from me carrys it. 36.6% thca”
“Mellow low grade high.  Smooth smoke but didn't taste very good.  Looked like brown dirt weed.  Worst I've had in a very long time.”
“It is...Bliss! Laugh,chill,munch,create,be!....feel the body-melt,mind-expand...peace,love,dream!”
“Bad couch lock!!!  Good pain management and mental health issues”

“Been smoking high quality flowers for 38 years and know a little about how one is supposed to feel.  This med was so bad it has to rank up there with the worst stuff I have ever vaped.  Brown and ugly smelling from the Discount DePOT in Phoenix.  I would never waste any money on this stuff or on the dePOT.”

“Ok... This strain isn't bad, but I tend to lean towards the ones which don't mess with the head as bad. It was a good feeling and I did feel the pain reside a little, but then I found myself a little anxious. I will try this one more time, if anything changes, I'll be sure to update this review.”
